{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TL-WR1043ND-v2_01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 450Mbps Wireless N Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WR1043 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = ND |revision = v2.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/24/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-WR1043ND_v2.x |wlclass = N450 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7WR1043NDV2 |icid = 8853A-WR1043ND |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050500314 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9558;QCA9558-AT4A, PN8B888.002C, 1304, CHINA; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 720 <!-- 720 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q64FVSIG; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N;AR8327N-AT4A; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 64:66:B3, C0:4A:00 |oui = 64:66:B3, C0:4A:00
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4 GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2574BL-R;;3; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TP-LINK_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/31/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 845973051389 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B002YLAUU8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500314" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== {{startflatlist|indent=1}} *[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=238&model=TL-WR1043ND Product page] *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/TL-WR1043ND/index.htm Firmware Interface] *[http://www.tplink.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WR1043ND&version=V2 Downloads] {{endflatlist}}
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr1043nd ''TP-LINK TL-WR1043ND'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] The firmware differs from TL-WR1043ND v3.x in the addition in: :- IPv6 support :- Wireless Guest Network The hardware seems to be identical.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = tl-wr1043ndv2 build 24118 20140523
Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr1043nd_v2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr1043nd |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx-ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 23.05.2 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
